data.comment: The match has started at Rentschler Field.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Toronto drives forward and Alejandro Pozuelo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Atlanta throw-in in Toronto's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hartford.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Alejandro Pozuelo for Toronto drives towards goal at Rentschler Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Jurgen Damm (Atlanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In the minute 11, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 15, Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 19, Tsubasa Endoh for Toronto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Toronto’s Jonathan Osorio is on his feet again at Rentschler Field.
Attention is being given to Toronto’s Jonathan Osorio and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 20, The home team replace Jonathan Osorio with Michael Bradley.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 24, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Important block from the Toronto defence as Jon Gallagher fires in a strike for Atlanta.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 27, At Rentschler Field, Atlanta are penalized for being offside.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 31, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 37, Throw-in Atlanta.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 40, Omar Gonzalez (Toronto) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Atlanta defenders.
Toronto drive upfield and Pablo Piatti gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
In Hartford Toronto drive forward through Marky Delgado. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Atlanta.
In the minute 42, Omar Gonzalez for Toronto has been booked by Fotis Bazakos and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Rentschler Field.
The second-half is underway at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Atlanta at Rentschler Field.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 46, Marcelino Moreno is replacing Emerson Hyndman for the away team.
Atlanta make their second substitution with Ezequiel Barco replacing Jake Mulraney.
The home team have replaced Tony Gallacher with Richie Laryea. This is the second substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
Fotis Bazakos awards Atlanta a goal kick.
In Hartford, Atlanta push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, In Hartford Toronto attack through Alejandro Pozuelo. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Rentschler Field.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hartford.
In the minute 54, Toronto pushes forward through Patrick Mullins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 57, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Atlanta throw-in in Toronto's half.
In the minute 62, Toronto attack but Tsubasa Endoh's header doesn't find the target.
Fotis Bazakos awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
In the minute 66, Stephen Glass is making the team's third substitution at Rentschler Field with Erick Torres replacing Jurgen Damm.
Stephen Glass (Atlanta) is making a fourth substitution, with Brooks Lennon replacing Jon Gallagher.
Nick DeLeon is replacing Tsubasa Endoh for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 66, Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a fourth substitution, with Jayden Nelson replacing Patrick Mullins.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Hartford, Erick Torres (Atlanta) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Eric Remedi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Eric Remedi (Atlanta) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Matheus Rossetto.
In the minute 76, Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Toronto's Nick DeLeon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Toronto.
Liam Fraser is replacing Marky Delgado for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Atlanta's Miles Robinson has been booked in Hartford.
In the minute 82, Free kick Toronto.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anton Walkes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Anton Walkes returns to the field for Atlanta after picking up a slight injury.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Atlanta throw-in in Toronto's half.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Toronto move into a 1-0 lead through a Pablo Piatti header.
Great play from Richie Laryea to set up the goal.
Fotis Bazakos will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Atlanta.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
That's full-time at Rentschler Field. The final score is 1-0.
